title: Man in critical condition after southeast side shooting
content:
Indianapolis, IND. — IMPD is investigating a shooting on the southeast side of Indianapolis.
So far, police say just after 2 a.m. an 18-year-old man was shot.
This all happened at Littleleaf Plaza and Littleleaf Court.
We’re told he is in critical condition this morning.
Police have not released any suspect information or motive for this shooting.
